label: 天照大神
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
見出し読み: あまてらすおおみかみ
見出し読み_mod: あまてらすおおみかみ
説明文: most important of all the Shintō Deities (Kami), being the leading Deity in the Plain of High Heaven (Takamagahara) and the original ancestress of the Imperial Family. Worshiped at the Great Ise Shrine (Ise-dai-jingū) where The Mirror (Yata-no-kagami) is kept as an incarnation of her spirit. [神、高天が原、伊勢大神宮、八咫鏡]
